description: FORMAL DESCRIPTION: Partial demolitions, extensions, refurbishment and change of use of existing building to provide new shared living residential accommodation (Sui Generis), flexible commercial floorspace (Class E), flexible commercial and music venue floorspace (Class E and Sui Generis (music venue and drinking establishment)), amenity space, landscaping, new cycle parking, and other associated works.DETAILED DESCRIPTION: Partial demolitions, part 5, 8 and 15-storey extensions, refurbishment and change of use of the existing building to provide 359 shared living residential accommodation (co-living units - Sui Generis), flexible commercial floorspace (Class E), flexible commercial and music venue floorspace (Class E and Sui Generis (music venue and drinking establishment)), amenity space, landscaping, new cycle parking, and other associated works.
